content:
I asked my family what piece of advice they would remember from me if I died. 
Chloe: Don't be single
JJ: Get lots of girlfriends
Kate: Enjoy your sexuality 
Ava: RTFQ (read the question)
Funny that 3 of 4 were relationship advice when they were all asked independently. I swear I don't talk about that much out loud. Maybe I do. Ava's one was top notch though
